trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.envreport_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> interface opens. This image illustrates the Environment Reporter interface <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#hss_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#lina_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.envreport_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> interface opens.

This image illustrates the Environment Reporter interface <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#hss_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#lina_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>:

target.mrk: L'interface de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.envreport_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> s'ouvre.

Cette image illustre l'interface de l'Environment Reporter <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#hss_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">(<MadCap:xref href="#lina_Environment_Reporter_interface" class="figure_x">see Figure</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText> :

trans-unit.source: Environment Reporter interface

seg-source.mrk: Environment Reporter interface

target.mrk: Interface Environment Reporter

trans-unit.source: Environment Reporter interface

seg-source.mrk: Environment Reporter interface

target.mrk: Interface Environment Reporter

trans-unit.source: A pane with a selectable list in the upper left part of the window displays the names of all Atempo software environments detected on the system.

seg-source.mrk: A pane with a selectable list in the upper left part of the window displays the names of all Atempo software environments detected on the system.

target.mrk: Un volet avec une liste sélectionnable dans la partie supérieure gauche de la fenêtre affiche les noms de tous les environnements logiciels Atempo

trans-unit.source: The second pane, in the middle of the interface, is empty and not applicable to your product. It can be ignored.

seg-source.mrk: The second pane, in the middle of the interface, is empty and not applicable to your product.
It can be ignored.

target.mrk: Le second volet, au milieu de l’interface, est vide et ne concerne pas votre produit.
N’en tenez pas compte.

trans-unit.source: Three read-only text fields in the upper right corner display information on the selected service (<MadCap:xref href="#Read-only_text_fields" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Three read-only text fields in the upper right corner display information on the selected service (<MadCap:xref href="#Read-only_text_fields" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Trois champs en lecture seule en haut à droite affichent des informations sur le service sélectionné (<MadCap:xref href="#Read-only_text_fields" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Read-only text fields

seg-source.mrk: Read-only text fields

target.mrk: Champs en lecture seule

trans-unit.source: Text Field

seg-source.mrk: Text Field

target.mrk: Libellé du champ

trans-unit.source: Value

seg-source.mrk: Value

target.mrk: Valeur

trans-unit.source: Status Service

seg-source.mrk: Status Service

target.mrk: Status Service

trans-unit.source: This can be Running, Stopped, or Does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: This can be Running, Stopped, or Does not exist.

target.mrk: Ceci peut être Running, Stopped ou NA (en cours, arrêté ou non applicable).

trans-unit.source: Host Name

seg-source.mrk: Host Name

target.mrk: Host Name

trans-unit.source: The name of the machine hosting the server of the selected software environment.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the machine hosting the server of the selected software environment.

target.mrk: Le nom de la machine qui héberge le serveur de l'environnement logiciel sélectionné.

trans-unit.source: Version

seg-source.mrk: Version

target.mrk: Version

trans-unit.source: The version and patch of the selected software environment.

seg-source.mrk: The version and patch of the selected software environment.

target.mrk: La version et le patch de l'environnement logiciel sélectionné.

trans-unit.source: When used with <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> server or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> agent</MadCap:conditionalText>, the Status Service field is not used and shows NA(Not Applicable).

seg-source.mrk: When used with <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> server or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> agent</MadCap:conditionalText>, the Status Service field is not used and shows NA(Not Applicable).

target.mrk: Lorsqu'il est utilisé avec <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">un serveur ou agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText> <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, le champ Status Service n’est pas utilisé et affiche NA (Non applicable).

trans-unit.source: Generate Configuration Only

seg-source.mrk: Generate Configuration Only

target.mrk: Generate Configuration Only

trans-unit.source: If you select this option check box, only files related to the system configuration are collected. No information on your software is collected.

seg-source.mrk: If you select this option check box, only files related to the system configuration are collected.
No information on your software is collected.

target.mrk: Si vous cochez cette option, seuls les fichiers concernant la configuration du système sont collectés.
Aucune information sur votre logiciel n'est collectée.

trans-unit.source: Options Button

seg-source.mrk: Options Button

target.mrk: Bouton Options

trans-unit.source: Click Options to open a window that offers various choices on Report Packaging and Secure Report service:

seg-source.mrk: Click Options to open a window that offers various choices on Report Packaging and Secure Report service:

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Options pour afficher une fenêtre qui vous offre des choix sur le Report Packaging (conditionnement du rapport) et le Secure Report (rapport sécurisé) :

trans-unit.source: Generate a zip file Select this option to compress the Environment Report into a zip file upon generation. Since the compression reduces the file size significantly, this option is selected by default.

seg-source.mrk: Generate a zip file Select this option to compress the Environment Report into a zip file upon generation.
Since the compression reduces the file size significantly, this option is selected by default.

target.mrk: Generate a zip fileSélectionnez cette option pour compresser le rapport d'environnement en fichier zip lors de la génération.
Puisque la compression permet une réduction importante de la taille du fichier, cette option est sélectionnée par défaut.

trans-unit.source: Remove IP Addresses Select this option to remove your network IP addresses from the report.

seg-source.mrk: Remove IP Addresses Select this option to remove your network IP addresses from the report.

target.mrk: Remove IP Addresses Sélectionnez cette option pour enlever vos adresses de réseau IP du rapport.

trans-unit.source: Generate Report Button

seg-source.mrk: Generate Report Button

target.mrk: Bouton Generate Report

trans-unit.source: When you have finished setting up all your configuration details, clicking this button permits you to run the report.

seg-source.mrk: When you have finished setting up all your configuration details, clicking this button permits you to run the report.

target.mrk: Quand vous avez choisi votre configuration, cliquez sur ce bouton pour exécuter le rapport.
